title: Art By Kita
description: Fully device, browser and SEO optimized website made for a Dreamscape and a Landscape artist with full payment capabilities.

title: Boardom Be Gone
description: Full stack website with a large database for sale of games and board games. Website is fully browser, device and SEO optimized.

title: ADHD Screening
description: A fully front end site aimed at parents, has a questionnaire to fill out to estimate if your child has ADHD, graded across 5 metrics (symptom groups) and can advise of services in your area.

title: Fuel Cost Calculator
description: Fully backend terminal based application which takes user input to work out how much money they will need to spend on fuel for any given journey helping them prepare better.
